text:
You may have the ability to cancel your service after logging into your online account. You may speak to a live chat agent only after log in. Otherwise, you can contact us via phone. What can I help you with next:

  • What portal do I log into?

  • Get phone support number

  • I have another question

transitionRoutes.targetPage: Provide you the number to call
transitionRoutes.name: 1d7d7ed0-c46a-46b4-9bae-7acdde62af61

transitionRoutes.condition: $session.params.userinput != "What portal do I log into" AND $session.params.userinput != "I have another question" AND $session.params.userinput != "Get phone support number"
transitionRoutes.name: 7526b79c-3a39-413a-a88e-7f7523e7e606
